verbs.description: [ARG0: President Trump] [V: talked] [ARG1: about the television ratings and the excellent treatment Kim Jong Un gave three American captives sentenced to hard labor] . The theatrics continued hours later with a tweeted announcement of a summit . Is treating a nuclear - armed hostage - taker like a reality contestant risky ?
